snippet: The rover called Curiosity ushers in a new era of exploration that could turn up evidence that the Red Planet once had the ingredients for life.
abstract: National Aeronautics and Space Administration receives some well-earned congratulations as Mars rover Curiosity successfully lands on the planet and broadcasts images back to earth; rover ushers in a new era of exploration that could turn up evidence that Mars once had ingredients for life.
lead_paragraph: The rover called Curiosity ushers in a new era of exploration that could turn up evidence that the Red Planet once had the ingredients for life.

headline.seo: NASA Sends First Images of Curiosity Rover on Mars
headline.main: After Safe Landing, Rover Sends Images From Mars
headline.print_headline: After Safe Landing, a Rover Sends Images From Mars
